Html:
If I do the following  :

 $table = $section->addTable();     

 $table->addRow(300);       

$table->addCell(750)->addText("test1");       

$table->addCell(1000)->addText("test2");       

$table->addCell(300)->addText("test3");

The width of the cells do not change, instead they just split their width over the size of the page...

Anybody else have this problem?

It could be that the reach the maximum size. For more information regarding the sizes I recommend you to read this: http://startbigthinksmall.wordpress.com/2010/01/04/points-inches-and-emus-measuring-units-in-office-open-xml/
